name: Kabul Polytechnic University
description: Kabul polytechnic University (KPU) was established on the field of 60 hectares area in 1963. This University has 3 faculties and 20 departments (courses) that include 12 professional and 8 general subjected departments.  This University is the basic center of training for professional engineering cadres in Afghanistan that has trained thousands of specialists in professions of construction of Civil and Industrial buildings, Hydro technical buildings, Road construction, Architecture, Geology and mining, Geology and exploration of mines, Geology and exploration of petroleum and gas, Chemical technology, Engineering geodesy, Automobile and tractor, Power electric supply for industrial institutions cities and villages in B.Sc., M.Sc and P.H.D degrees. For the time being percentage of academic degrees of professors working in this University is 33% in P.H.D degree, 67% in M.Sc. degree and 55% of them are BSc degrees.   For more information about this university please go to http://www.kpu.edu.af.
